title: The Summoner's League looking for casters!
body:
TSL is looking for a dedicated and skilled broadcasting team to be the face of the Leagues seasons. A Twitch account with Turbo will be provided. 

Please contact me in game with questions. 

Thesummonersleague.wix.com/tsleague

replies.body: Hello, I'd be very interested in casting your league. Let me know if there are still available spots.

Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2

> [{quoted}](name=9tt2,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=mkVA2TGB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-07T18:19:01.573+0000)
>
> Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.
> 
> na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2

You have casting experience?

> [{quoted}](name=DatSpookyGhost,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=mkVA2TGB,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-07T22:09:56.831+0000)
>
> You have casting experience?

I play morg, raka, and nami for casters. the rest are tanks

> [{quoted}](name=9tt2,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=mkVA2TGB,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-05-09T15:49:23.211+0000)
>
> I play morg, raka, and nami for casters. the rest are tanks

He means shoutcasters for games that are streamed, not champion casters.

> [{quoted}](name=Cone,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=mkVA2TGB,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-09T15:51:37.498+0000)
>
> He means shoutcasters for games that are streamed, not champion casters.

I had a feeling but i was hoping he wasn't haha

> [{quoted}](name=9tt2,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=mkVA2TGB,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-09T16:01:59.702+0000)
>
> I had a feeling but i was hoping he wasn't haha

Sorry. Yeah I'm referring to stream casters.
I would be willing to depends on time slots
Still looking for a supporting caster!
We are looking for 1 supporting caster now!
